summary: This is an email from the US Marshals Service (USMS) requesting copies of any reports prepared in relation to Jeffrey Epstein. It was sent on July 25, 2019, shortly after Epstein's arrest, indicating an internal information request within the justice system.

events.title: USMS Request for Epstein Reports
events.description: An email is sent from the US Marshals Service requesting copies of any reports prepared in relation to Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: The US Marshals Service (USMS) is requesting information about Jeffrey Epstein.
The request is dated July 25, 2019, which is shortly after Epstein's arrest on July 6, 2019.
The email suggests an internal information-gathering process within the justice system regarding the Epstein case.
The subject line indicates the request is related to an 'Epstein incident'.
